unnormalised: My cousin, Priya from IIT Delhi, used to swear by these apps during her exams. Remember "3 Idiots"? Stress levels were like Rancho’s engine! She said it helped her with mindfulness, especially when deadlines loomed. I'm considering trying one now, maybe to manage my own daily anxieties. Hope it works as well for me as it did for her!
